state.prompt: Which state do you live in? / आप किस राज्य में रहते हैं?
state.dtmf_prompt: Press 1 for Maharashtra, 2 for Tamil Nadu, 3 for Uttar Pradesh, 4 for Other

land_hectares.prompt: How many hectares of farm land do you own? / आपके पास कितनी हेक्टेयर जमीन है?
land_hectares.dtmf_prompt: Enter land in hectares (e.g. press 1 for less than 2 hectares)

income_annual.prompt: What is your annual family income in rupees? / वार्षिक पारिवारिक आय क्या है?

aadhaar_last4.prompt: Please say the last 4 digits of your Aadhaar number / आधार के अंतिम 4 अंक बताएं
aadhaar_last4.dtmf_prompt: Please enter the last 4 digits of your Aadhaar

data.grievance_draft:
To,
The District Grievance Officer,
Applicant'S District District

Subject: Grievance Regarding Government Scheme Payment — Ref: GRV-184572

Respected Sir/Madam,

I am writing to formally register a grievance regarding: mera paisa nahi aaya. Despite fulfilling all eligibility criteria, I have not received the entitled benefit. I respectfully request an urgent review and resolution of this matter.

Grievance Reference No.: GRV-184572

Yours faithfully,
[Applicant Name]

is_first_time_buyer.prompt: Is this your first time applying for government housing? (yes/no)

Subject: Grievance Regarding Government Scheme Payment — Ref: GRV-060993

Respected Sir/Madam,

I am writing to formally register a grievance regarding: mera paisa nahi aaya hai. Despite fulfilling all eligibility criteria, I have not received the entitled benefit. I respectfully request an urgent review and resolution of this matter.

Yours faithfully,
[Applicant Name]
